=== About Me ===

Hi, I'm 31 years old, coming from a small town in the middle of Germany, <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sontra|Sontra]]</nowiki>. I've been a regular Linux-User since 1998, starting with SuSE, RedHat, Debian (which I still use for Servers) and Ubuntu on my home-computer.
